Posts.EditableText:
Can I add a string of aliases to objects, in their alias field, in the same way I separate custom commands?

i.e
```
alias1; alias2; alias3; alias4
```
Posts.HTML:
Can I add a string of aliases to objects, in their alias field, in the same way I separate custom commands?

i.e

alias1; alias2; alias3; alias4

Posts.EditableText: Try it and see if it works (as I'm lazy, lol. If you're as lazy as me, then wait for someone else to answer, lol)

Posts.EditableText:
No.

But you can add alteratives on the second tab.
